def solution(nums):
    my_list = []
    
    for num in nums:
        if not num in my_list:
            my_list.append(num)
        
    return min(len(my_list), (len(nums)/2))

ì¢‹ì•„ìš”ê°€ ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ í’€ì´

1
2

def solution(ls):
    return min(len(ls)/2, len(set(ls)))

ìƒê°í•´ë³¼ í’€ì´

8

def solution(nums):
    answer = 0
    myList = set(nums)
    if len(nums)/2 > len(myList):
        answer = len(myList)
    else:
        answer = len(nums)/2
    return answer

def solution(nums):
    myList = set(nums)    
    return min( len(set(nums)), len(nums)/2 )
